Trample; Undying
[i]From Shadow[/i] – When Medeus, the Shadow Dragon enters, if it entered with a counter on it, you may pay 4 life. If you do, move that counter onto another target permanent. That permanent becomes a 4/4 black Dragon creature with flying until end of turn, in addition to its other types.
[i]Dark Breath[/i] – Dragons you control have rampage 3.
[i]Dragonstone – [/i]Whenever a creature you control transforms, target opponent loses 3 life.
